    • Method Detail

      • deleteQRCode

        public void deleteQRCode​(java.util.ArrayList<QrCodeTag> tagsToDelete)
        Deletes the specified QR code tags by removing their relationship, updating their ranking, and updating the overall ranking. This method uses an ExecutorService to execute the deletion operations concurrently on a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        tagsToDelete - An ArrayList of QrCodeTag objects to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if tagsToDelete is null.

      • checkUniqueCodeScanned

        public void checkUniqueCodeScanned​(java.lang.String hashString,
                                   Owner.CheckUniqueCallback callback)
        This returns true if the owner is the only person who scanned this code
        Parameters:
        hashString - hashString of to be deleted code
        callback - interface deal with asynchronous problem when check duplicated

      • removeFromQrCollection

        public void removeFromQrCollection​(java.lang.String hashString)
        This function remove QrCode from QrCodes collection in database
        Parameters:
        hashString - string of QrCode to be deleted

      • removeRelationship

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> removeRelationship​(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference qrRef)
        This function remove relationship between player and that QrCode in scannedBy collection
        Parameters:
        qrRef - document reference to the qrcode to be deleted
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture string object announce finished reading database

        public void addQRCode​(QrCode code,
                      java.lang.String comment,
                      java.lang.String image)
        This function add new QrCode
        Parameters:
        code - object of QrCode class, store newly created code info
        comment - comment string of that player for new qrcode
        image - image go along with the qrcode just scanned

      • updateRankingRelated

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> updateRankingRelated​(int codeScore,
                                                                                     int addition,
                                                                                     int nextScore)
        This update total score, rank and highest code point of the player after adding/removing given qrCode
        Parameters:
        codeScore - score of the newly scanned code
        addition - 1 represents add, -1 represent subtract
        nextScore - store score of the next smaller code in player's QrCode list
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture string object announce finished reading database

      • describeContents

        public int describeContents()
        Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of writeToParcel(Parcel, int), the return value of this method must include the Parcelable.CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR bit.
        Specified by:
        describeContents in interface android.os.Parcelable
        Returns:
        a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance.

      • writeToParcel

        public void writeToParcel​(@NonNull
                          android.os.Parcel dest,
                          int flags)
        Flatten this object in to a Parcel.
        Specified by:
        writeToParcel in interface android.os.Parcelable
        Parameters:
        dest - The Parcel in which the object should be written.
        flags - Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or Parcelable.PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE.

        public void checkQrCodeExist​(java.lang.String hashString,
                             Owner.CheckExistCallback callback)
        Check to see if qrcode already exists in collection
        Parameters:
        hashString - SHA-256 string of the newly scanned qr code
        callback - interface deal with asynchronous problem when check code existence
